mapper.select: SELECT CLASSNUM, MASTERNUM, INSTRUCTOR, PRIMARYCATEGORY, SECONDARYCATEGORY, TITLE, CONTENT, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, PRICE, INFORMATION, DURATION, LIMITNUM, PREPARATION, ABOUTME, IMAGE1, IMAGE2, IMAGE3, IMAGE4, IMAGE5, LOCATION, YOUTUBELINKE, LIKECOUNT, DEL, OLDREGNUM, NEWREGNUM, A.PROFILEPIC FROM ONEDAYCLASS O, ACLAPMEMBER A WHERE CLASSNUM = #{classNum}
